text: Death toll in the road accident in which an omni bus overturned near Valliyoor in the district recently rose to ten on Sunday following the death of a four-year-old boy Aaron Biju in a hospital at Thiruvananthapuram. When a multi-axle Volvo bus, proceeding from Karaikal to Thiruvananthapuram, overturned at Pilaakottaipaarai near Valliyoor on January 8, nine persons were killed and 25 injured.
title: Death toll in accident rises to ten
